spring.description: Spring in the Savanna is the wet season. It is a time for the water reserves to be replenished.

summer.description: Summer in the Savanna is the storm season. It can be windy with occasional Sandstorms that ravage anything that is unsheltered.

autumn.description: Autumn in the Savanna is the quiet season. The weather is hot, but milder than in the summer. It is traditionally a time to rest after surviving the storms of summer.

winter.description: Winter in the Savanna is a cool season. Breezes blow over the grasslands, bringing with them milder weather than in the autumn, and even the occasional snow cloud.
